starbuncleAdoptions.name: Stekkie
starbuncleAdoptions.bio: Saw a mythical rhino named Stekkie and thought it was so cool that they started going through a metamorphosis to transform into one. Stekkie is now content with life and strives to definitely not cause mischief

starbuncleAdoptions.name: Ashen
starbuncleAdoptions.bio: Despite being seen as an omen of pestilence and strife his cute little face reassures you that everything will be alright.

starbuncleAdoptions.name: Xephyr
starbuncleAdoptions.bio: This quiet Starbuncle once lived in an Ancient City that was covered in plant life. He had all the source berries he could ever want, and skipped amongst the sculk.

starbuncleAdoptions.name: Ophiuchus
starbuncleAdoptions.bio: When Ophiuchus slithers through the shadows, the stars weep blood and souls tremble with eternal despair.

starbuncleAdoptions.name: Stonks
starbuncleAdoptions.bio: Sees a starbuncle in the forest You: gives it a gold nugget Starbuncle: takes the nugget and teleports away You: Wait, that’s illegal. Starbuncle: comes back with more nuggets You: Stonks.

starbuncleAdoptions.name: Maximilian
starbuncleAdoptions.bio: Maximilian was sound asleep in the boughs of an Archwood tree but was unintentionally awakened by Kaeghen, who had dodged a horde of zombies with a Leap to the tree's top. Offered a nugget of gold as apology for interrupting his sleep the drowsy Starbuncle and Kaeghen became fast friends.

starbuncleAdoptions.name: Dr. Cat
starbuncleAdoptions.bio: In the realm of intellectual curiosity, Dr. Cat, a brilliant Starbunkle, embarked on an extraordinary journey under the tutelage of their owner, Raycoms. Late nights spent poring over textbooks and engaging in spirited discussions with Raycoms fueled Dr. Cat's hunger for knowledge. Through unwavering determination and countless hours of study, Dr. Cat, became a trailblazing symbol of Starbunkle intellect and the limitless possibilities of knowledge.

starbuncleAdoptions.name: Trix
starbuncleAdoptions.bio: Trix came to visit while we were redstoning. We gave her a nugget and she gave us her love. The cutie has been fetching trinkets for us since!

starbuncleAdoptions.name: Lucky
starbuncleAdoptions.bio: This curious Starbuncle has a habit of showing up in the most unlikely places. Zieg found this little starby hiding, with slightly singed fur, inside a rune based smelter; dutifully holding on to a freshly smelted gold ingot.

starbuncleAdoptions.name: Nyx
starbuncleAdoptions.bio: Infused by the void of the End, Nyx was born of an ill-fated experiment by Sadie to develop a spell to enable safe void travel.  It went wrong, and this Starbuncle's fur turned black.  Be careful, they've been caught peering over the shoulder of every wizard they meet to catch a peek at their notes!

starbuncleAdoptions.name: Chestnut
starbuncleAdoptions.bio: Most confuse Chestnut for a squirrel rather than a magical hopper. She prefers it that way.

starbuncleAdoptions.name: Solstice
starbuncleAdoptions.bio: Solstice likes to wander off and explore the unknown, usually leaving the task at hand unfinished. She will usually be found in someone's home relieving them of their gold and other valuables.

starbuncleAdoptions.name: Aoife
starbuncleAdoptions.bio: Sarenor was in desperate need of help automating his  Imbuement Stills when Aoife pranced through his automation basement on the search for adventure and food. After tossing a gold nugget at her, Aoife became Sarenors first and best Still Master. Today she enjoys a good dram, friends, and nice chair.

starbuncleAdoptions.name: Ser Orstell
starbuncleAdoptions.bio: Ser Orstell was once a knight of the Order of the Sacred Nug, keepers of the greatest gold nugget ever found. Orstell is now retired and wander in our world, from shrine to shrine to spread the myth of the Sacret Nug, and to seek a more quiet life in company of a wizard.

starbuncleAdoptions.name: Carter
starbuncleAdoptions.bio: Carter is a weird mix between loving and hating strangers, he is happy to jump at your legs and walk with you but is a ninja at dogdging hands, he enjoys Cuddles with his human.

starbuncleAdoptions.name: Peregrimm
starbuncleAdoptions.bio: A proud furry squire of Dragon's keeping up his moral with snuggles and cheering him on with squeaks and growls.  Also a brave protector from the little creepies and come for his companion in the night.

starbuncleAdoptions.name: Litl
starbuncleAdoptions.bio: He's just a little, vibey guy!

starbuncleAdoptions.name: Luna
starbuncleAdoptions.bio: Just let me sleep.

starbuncleAdoptions.name: Archimedes
starbuncleAdoptions.bio: Failed at becoming a mage because he wasn't able to hold the spell book so he went on a quest to find a smaller one.

starbuncleAdoptions.name: Fisher
starbuncleAdoptions.bio: A friendly, swishy lil' guy who likes to zip around at 100 kilometers an hour.

starbuncleAdoptions.name: Atmos
starbuncleAdoptions.bio: Spends their time gazing at the open sky, and loves taking rides with Elytra-fliers.

starbuncleAdoptions.name: Dusty
starbuncleAdoptions.bio: This peculular hoarder was found huddled up between a few thrown pillows and a fireplace settled in Coda's study, relishing in the ambient heat before being discovered trying to store away every bit of gold found around the room over a period of a few days undiscovered. A feisty little critter that ducks away from offered affection, they're most appropriately described as an adorable troublemaker.

starbuncleAdoptions.name: Shade
starbuncleAdoptions.bio: Once a necromancer's Familiar now a wondering soul looking for its next master, waiting for the return of his first.

starbuncleAdoptions.name: Splonk
starbuncleAdoptions.bio: Splonk may seem a bit wobbly at times, but they seem to be perfectly fine otherwise!

starbuncleAdoptions.name: Bailey
starbuncleAdoptions.bio: Ars Nouveau is a passion project brought to life by hundreds of contributions from the community. We hope you enjoy this Rainbow-buncle as much as we enjoy making this mod! Thanks for playing!

starbuncleAdoptions.name: Wolfram
starbuncleAdoptions.bio: Wolfram used to work for a chemist with 117 other starbuncles. While Wolfram was the only one able to distinguish materials from every element of the Periodic Table, all of his sisters and brothers struggled with basically any element except for gold.

starbuncleAdoptions.name: Nemo
starbuncleAdoptions.bio: Please help me find my family uwu

starbuncleAdoptions.name: Nuna
starbuncleAdoptions.bio: Stop staring, gimmie treats now

starbuncleAdoptions.name: Aki
starbuncleAdoptions.bio: Found on the shore near a chest, Aki seems to have been forgotten by a prior mage, She hates loud noises, and Skeletons. A note on her neck reads "please give her a better life on the land then I could on the sea"

starbuncleAdoptions.name: Snowflake
starbuncleAdoptions.bio: On the far-flung plane of Alfheim, in the eternally frozen retreat of the fae of the Winter Court, amid a patch of preternaturally-tall, luminous crocus, DerringerCubed met this warm, soft fluffball curled up for a moment's rest. She is deterred by neither the long nights and relentless snows of deep winter nor the lingering traces of unnatural magic that always seem to surround her new friend.

starbuncleAdoptions.name: Rhaast
starbuncleAdoptions.bio: A misguided spirit who is searching for her wizard companion

starbuncleAdoptions.name: WaveClaw
starbuncleAdoptions.bio: Found enjoying shiny metal that reminds one of cheese and sunrises.

starbuncleAdoptions.name: Ivory
starbuncleAdoptions.bio: A very small little friend eager to be loved. She is very curious but seems to be very smart, eager to try and help however she can. She tends to be anxious around new people, but will melt with joy if you give her pets. She has a small mushroom and a goat sticker always on her back.

starbuncleAdoptions.name: Elis
starbuncleAdoptions.bio: It is staring at you with confusion.

starbuncleAdoptions.name: Berry
starbuncleAdoptions.bio: Found in an abandoned mage tower. Seems to enjoy source berries and live jazz

starbuncleAdoptions.name: Cookie
starbuncleAdoptions.bio: Cookie has a knack for finding the juiciest and most delicious Sourceberries, and sometimes sneaks into Sourceberry farms to satisfy his sweet tooth. Don’t be surprised if you see him with a berry-stained mouth and a guilty grin.

starbuncleAdoptions.name: Skytail
starbuncleAdoptions.bio: Skytail thrives on companionship, supports magic users with a positive and upbeat attitude, and spreads happiness wherever it goes.

starbuncleAdoptions.name: Sarrion
starbuncleAdoptions.bio: A once powerful mage accidentally turned himself into a starbuncle! He hasn't really bothered to turn himself back. Perhaps he enjoys the simple life?

starbuncleAdoptions.name: Trixie
starbuncleAdoptions.bio: It's staring at you with confusion.

starbuncleAdoptions.name: Jayden
starbuncleAdoptions.bio: Because Race Car!

starbuncleAdoptions.name: Jade
starbuncleAdoptions.bio: Enjoys snoozing in the grass or hanging out on the front porch

starbuncleAdoptions.name: Sleeping Rose
starbuncleAdoptions.bio: A sleepy lil guy! Smells like roses and has quite an... odd air about them. Stare into their eyes and the void might stare back… Still cute though and loves snuggles

starbuncleAdoptions.name: Shimmer
starbuncleAdoptions.bio: Playful and curious little fella who loves to explore the world and make new friends.

starbuncleAdoptions.name: Glitero
starbuncleAdoptions.bio: A funny little guy who loves glitter

starbuncleAdoptions.name: Avie
starbuncleAdoptions.bio: This starbuncle has large tusks that protrude from the mouth. She smiles happily as she eats your shoes and spellbook. She loves fetch and picking sourceberries but she might eat a few.

starbuncleAdoptions.name: Durin
starbuncleAdoptions.bio: Found hiding from a snowstorm in a mountain cave. Durin is a wanderer attracted to all things shiny beneath the mountains.

starbuncleAdoptions.name: Elson the Timid
starbuncleAdoptions.bio: Despite his name, Elson is so brave and definitely not trembling in his tiny squirrel boots (sidenote, he is very proud of his custom made boots). He loves being in safe dark spaces (not because he's scared, it's just comfy).

starbuncleAdoptions.name: Stardust
starbuncleAdoptions.bio: Found a certain place in the End. He loves flying like an elytra and enjoys doing it. He can seem to give glide effect by himself.

starbuncleAdoptions.name: Mega Volta
starbuncleAdoptions.bio: The sworn enemy of mega mindy wandering around looking for revenge. Sterre hagedoorn is her ally.

starbuncleAdoptions.name: Gold Loving Starbuncle
starbuncleAdoptions.bio: A greedy thief who wanted to learn all spells at a low cost got turned into a starbuncle! It seems that even in his starbuncle state, he still loves gold and riches as much as when he was a human.

starbuncleAdoptions.name: Squiggle
starbuncleAdoptions.bio: Winner of the Squiggle Olympics, lover of fine cheese. Thinks they're a werewolf.

starbuncleAdoptions.name: Sunsun
starbuncleAdoptions.bio: Love to hang out when it's sunny and run after light. He's a bit warm like a little flame.

starbuncleAdoptions.name: Engenix, the curious
starbuncleAdoptions.bio: A little Starbuncle who lived in the forests near the house of an intelligent and friendly engineer, where he learned to create various things and lives making gadgets around, gears occasionally fall out of his magic tail (it's not clear how he keeps so many things in it, it must be magic), he loves copper nuggets and driving trains and machines, always curious and willing to help anyone who calls him.

starbuncleAdoptions.name: Spino
starbuncleAdoptions.bio: An orange starbuncle that likes to sprint around people. Likes source berries and pies. Thinks it is the fastest starbuncle in the world.

starbuncleAdoptions.name: Vic
starbuncleAdoptions.bio: She seems to really want to help you

starbuncleAdoptions.name: Kira, The Sleepy
starbuncleAdoptions.bio: A lonely little starbuncle, that loves to quietly slumber under trees and in caves.

starbuncleAdoptions.name: Kaori, The Almighty
starbuncleAdoptions.bio: Kaori was once one of the most powerful summoner in the world, until a mishap made a witch angry at them, Kaori will have her revenge once she undo the transformation, AND THE WITCH WILL BOW BEF- Oh! Shiny Nugget!

starbuncleAdoptions.name: Bengie
starbuncleAdoptions.bio: This Starbuncle loves plants and can often be spotted in trees or bushes.

starbuncleAdoptions.name: Magenty
starbuncleAdoptions.bio: This brightly colored starbuncle seems to have an endless supply of energy…almost like a 6 year old child...

starbuncleAdoptions.name: Ophelia
starbuncleAdoptions.bio: A friendly little helper, always on the lookout for a treat.

starbuncleAdoptions.name: Hank
starbuncleAdoptions.bio: From the void and abyss, Nuggets cute little companion Hank

starbuncleAdoptions.name: Hanabi
starbuncleAdoptions.bio: From high atop the snowy peaks, this starbuncle descended onto the land in an explosion of color.

starbuncleAdoptions.name: Rozeta
starbuncleAdoptions.bio: A curious Starbuncle that likes to build and experiment with magic.

starbuncleAdoptions.name: Oreo
starbuncleAdoptions.bio: The lost pet of Adam the Archmagi. Their eyes speak of countless war crimes committed in pursuit of spell perfection.

starbuncleAdoptions.name: Vivian
starbuncleAdoptions.bio: After having been bullied by her brothers and sisters for so long, she seeks a quiet life of peace. She only asks that you treat her well as she helps you with your adventure.

starbuncleAdoptions.name: Sprigly
starbuncleAdoptions.bio: Always loved to help in the mouse garden

starbuncleAdoptions.name: Inven
starbuncleAdoptions.bio: Curious and mischievous, this little starbuncle loves experimenting and discovering new things.

starbuncleAdoptions.name: Nugget
starbuncleAdoptions.bio: A cute lil guy who does cute lil things.

starbuncleAdoptions.name: OmegaYun
starbuncleAdoptions.bio: Is angry at a big dummy named Adashi.

starbuncleAdoptions.name: Honeybun
starbuncleAdoptions.bio: sweet, soft, shy, and loving loves cuddles and snacks

starbuncleAdoptions.name: Socks
starbuncleAdoptions.bio: Sent by a powerful archmage to help you. At least thats what it said on the note she carried...

starbuncleAdoptions.name: Stella
starbuncleAdoptions.bio: It seems they were sent by a certain alchemist and witch. to help you.

starbuncleAdoptions.name: Yuto
starbuncleAdoptions.bio: Full of RAGE!!...or maybe he just needs a snack

starbuncleAdoptions.name: Patches
starbuncleAdoptions.bio: Friendly and carefree, this Starbuncle loves to harvest pumpkins for some reason

starbuncleAdoptions.name: Alo'ra
starbuncleAdoptions.bio: This starbuncle is very well loved. She carries a note that reads "Please take care of her like she took care of me. She'd love to stargaze with you."

starbuncleAdoptions.name: Gootastic
starbuncleAdoptions.bio: It's unclear why it exists, but here we are. This Goobuncle's slimy demeanor is off-putting, but that's not so bad when you realize how unbelievably squishy its cheeks are.

starbuncleAdoptions.name: Tav
starbuncleAdoptions.bio: I wouldn't try to hit it. It might just be a poor starbuncle... or it might be a wildshaped druid..

starbuncleAdoptions.name: Buttercup
starbuncleAdoptions.bio: This tidy starbuncle loves collecting flowers and decorating its tail with them. Yet it has never seen the flower that it is named after...

starbuncleAdoptions.name: Cloud
starbuncleAdoptions.bio: This starbuncle is just here for the rest of the ride

starbuncleAdoptions.name: Fen
starbuncleAdoptions.bio: Introducing Fen, your adorable friend who thrives among berry bushes! With a warm personality, Fen is always eager to meet new friends, whether they are human or furry.

starbuncleAdoptions.name: Cookie
starbuncleAdoptions.bio: A timid yet playful starbuncle, soft as clouds to the touch, with a lingering, soothing fragrance of old books and vanilla. Though shy at first, its eyes eventually widen as it bursts to life in play, darting about with boundless energy and joy.

starbuncleAdoptions.name: Brandy
starbuncleAdoptions.bio: This Starbuncle likes to walk in the cool forest in the fall,staying at home in the winter and watching others stew meat

starbuncleAdoptions.name: Smokey Sugar
starbuncleAdoptions.bio: A hard working fellow. Very sweet and happy all around. They are eager to work for you.

starbuncleAdoptions.name: Corone
starbuncleAdoptions.bio: A vain little creature, known for her beautiful voice. Aesop warned her about foxes and flattery.

starbuncleAdoptions.name: Astrael
starbuncleAdoptions.bio: A mysterious but curious starbuncle, once loved by an archmage who got lost in time. Rumor says she was born among the stars, therefore her name.

starbuncleAdoptions.name: Xollus
starbuncleAdoptions.bio: This poor Starbuncle was originally a Bookwyrm, polymorphed into a Starbuncle as part of an experiment gone wrong.

starbuncleAdoptions.name: Archi
starbuncleAdoptions.bio: Archi was found tinkering with magical gadgets in an enchanted forest. It's a curious creature, always trying to automate everything around it. With a love for shiny items and complex machinery, it enjoys watching builds come to life and adds a touch of creativity wherever it goes.

starbuncleAdoptions.name: Floki
starbuncleAdoptions.bio: The mage's favorite little creature.

starbuncleAdoptions.name: Jaime
starbuncleAdoptions.bio: His staggering, wobbly gait does nothing to dampen his infectiously rambunctious and carefree spirit. Smells strongly of grapes.

starbuncleAdoptions.name: Eru
starbuncleAdoptions.bio: Not to be left unsupervised.

starbuncleAdoptions.name: Boo
starbuncleAdoptions.bio: Eternal Companion to the Spellblade Lufia, reincarnated in this life to help you on your journey. She may eat your snacks when you aren't looking. Real cat-like behavior right there.

starbuncleAdoptions.name: Mothball
starbuncleAdoptions.bio: There has never been a fluffier Starbuncle, nor will there be. While not particularly bright or strong, Mothball is always happy to be your friend!

starbuncleAdoptions.name: Will the Starbuncle
starbuncleAdoptions.bio: Will The Stabuncle do what? What Will he do? Will Will Willfully a thing?

starbuncleAdoptions.name: Nooch
starbuncleAdoptions.bio: What an odd name for a mystical creature? Oh well, at least it stands out amongst the rest of its kind, even if its a little.. weird.

starbuncleAdoptions.name: Eclipse
starbuncleAdoptions.bio: A little engineer turned into a curious creature, she's sure to help in any way she can.

starbuncleAdoptions.name: Lerya
starbuncleAdoptions.bio: Lerya is a curious little Starbuncle, and with the token of friendship she gave to you she shows her appreciation for your kindness. After her human parent ended her game with a deadly growth spell on lots of Sourceberries, Lerya feels very sad and lonely nowadays.

starbuncleAdoptions.name: Muffin
starbuncleAdoptions.bio: A rogue little monster that somehow escaped. Contain him! Who knows what he'll do now he's free! Last time he blew up! It was a miracle he lived that...

starbuncleAdoptions.name: Lilia
starbuncleAdoptions.bio: Lilia thrives in the moonlit night. Known to give powerful visions of the future to those who gaze at the moon while holding her.

starbuncleAdoptions.name: Ladislaw
starbuncleAdoptions.bio: If you ever see him falling, it probably wasn't him, you better check again.

starbuncleAdoptions.name: Puff Ball
starbuncleAdoptions.bio: A energetic and curious little Starbuncle that grows a bond to strengthen its heart. Many of worlds and friends have been made over the years and will continue to be made through its lifetime.

starbuncleAdoptions.name: Shadow
starbuncleAdoptions.bio: This little guy has been everywhere! Whether that be in your back yard, or the future, he's been there!

starbuncleAdoptions.name: Fuzz, the timid
starbuncleAdoptions.bio: The qualities which a person must possess to put Fuzz at ease are an enigma, known only to Fuzz. Just know that if he has chosen you, you must be quite special... and he's probably gonna be stuck to you like glue for a while.

starbuncleAdoptions.name: Chiaroscuro
starbuncleAdoptions.bio: Initially shy and skittish, Chiaroscuro becomes a deeply loyal and affectionate companion once she bonds with you. With an uncanny ability to sense your moods, she's always there to cuddle, comfort, and add a touch of playful mischief to your day!

starbuncleAdoptions.name: Orion
starbuncleAdoptions.bio: Orion is a traveler he has explored countless worlds throught out the universe and he will continue this journey until the end of time.

starbuncleAdoptions.name: Void
starbuncleAdoptions.bio: Void, the loyal familiar of Yuuki, was altered by their prolonged time in the Beyond. The dimension’s strange magic granted Void the ability to open wormholes, allowing him to collect and store items from across vast distances, forever tied to the mysteries of the void.

starbuncleAdoptions.name: Strawbee
starbuncleAdoptions.bio: This little starbuncle searches for strawberries. So far, she has not been successful.
oiiaiioiiiaii
starbuncleAdoptions.name: Nikkkkkkk
